title: WhisperDraft
description: A minimalist writing environment that combines voice-to-text capabilities with a distraction-free interface for capturing and refining ideas.

fullDescription.content: WhisperDraft is a minimalist writing environment designed to capture your thoughts through voice or text. It combines the power of voice-to-text technology with a distraction-free interface to help you focus on your ideas rather than the mechanics of writing.

items.title: Voice-to-Text
items.content: Capture your thoughts naturally by speaking, with real-time transcription

items.title: Distraction-Free Interface
items.content: Clean, minimal design that keeps you focused on your writing

items.title: Markdown Support
items.content: Format your text with simple markdown syntax

items.title: Dark Mode
items.content: Easy on the eyes for extended writing sessions

fullDescription.content: WhisperDraft is perfect for writers, researchers, and anyone who needs to quickly capture and refine ideas. The combination of voice input and text editing creates a seamless workflow that adapts to your thinking process.
